short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily images for an upcoming trip or bucketlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tripster - A traveler who likes visiting places that are off the beaten path.

Replace your boring plain new tab page with a new image per day based on a trip you are planning or maybe you are curious about seeing new places. If you have no trips planned, no problem, consider exploring different lands on your bucket list.  Also, featuring countdown, weather, map, photographer and image info.

Features of freebie version:
• New beautiful photo daily
• Trip countdown (get stoked!)
• Save your favorites
• See five-day weather forecast for location of each image
• Country Information (capital, currency, population, and size)
• Discover new places
• Set in your mind each day where you WANT to be! 

TRIPSTER LIFE PRO Features:

• Add two more trips
• One skip per day
• Thank you for supporting Tripster Life!

Permissions used with Tripster Life extension:

We use activeTab permission to allow opening a new tab in Chrome.  We store a login token in a cookie to enable automatically logging in with new browser sessions.  
For more information on privacy and the security of your data visit https://www.tripster.life/privacy.


CONTACT
Email us at admin@tripster.life
Twitter @LifeTripster

Our Mission: Wonder and excitement for the magnificent world we share.
